item.title: Default Gear
item.description:
Standard Gear of many looks

While all characters in Sonic Riders has a unique version of this gear available to them, they all perform the same in terms of statistics and gameplay.

Colloquially called “Default gear” or “Default” by the community at large, what it lacks in special mechanics, it gains in pure flexibility in races with two of it’s main properties.

Most other gears lose speed while charging jump, meaning that they will slow down and lose time while charging. Default is different, as not losing speed while charging jump means it gains easy access to tech known as “JCBC” (Jump-Cancel Boost-Chain), Bonk Dashing, and Attack Slide. Using these techniques means that default can generate or retain high speeds where other gears cannot.
